extendedInfo.description: Chomp your way to the top of the food chain in this fast-paced aquatic eat 'em-up. Binge on the beach, trawl the depths and raid the Antarctic to satisfy your appetite. Pick-up-and-play fun with beat-your-buddies online hiscores. Feeling peckish?iPhone: #1 in 17 countries, 800,000+ paid downloads!Part 2 includes Giant Enemies, Huge Shoals, Achievements and an edible Oil Barron!Feed your shark and grow to become the most formidable predator of the seas! But beware... this will soon attract the attention of armed shark hunters both above and below the waves.Checkout the games press reviews at www.fgol.com -+ BuzzFocus - 96%! "Hungry Shark is addictive, simple to play and undeniably fun. You can play for hours and only skim the surface of what this game has to offer... This game is just that damn good."+ Allemeineapps.de 5/5 + TouchGold.de 4.5/5 + AppSpy 4/5 + WeDoTech 4.5/5 Game features: + Full use of Tilt controls + alternate touch controls + An ocean full of food and enemies + Combo eating bonuses + Lost objects from the world above, find them all for big points + Hiscore tables: Private and Global, Last 24hrs, Your Country + Unlock achievements by completing 20+ new challenges! + Supports Move2sd so you can free up space on your phoneLog into checkout.google.com and check your order status if you have problems downloading. One off payment, no monthly charges.HD Tablet version coming soon as In-App Purchase.Part 1 also available in the Market.

reviews.title: Bad graphics
reviews.comment: Stick to Evo. This game is just not good at all.
reviews.author: Ryan Hunter

reviews.title: Don\'t buy this game!
reviews.comment: The pics make it look cooler than It is.... You have to pay extra for that. The controls are BRUTAL and as a result, you end up dying before you can do anything about it. Lame and deleted.   Too bad, cause it COULD have been a great game.   Wish I hadn\'t paid for this.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Shark Hunting Game!
reviews.comment: Fun+Great Graphics!!Played the Free Ver.first+completed in no time.Gameplay is tops!!Very Addictive+best 2 use the Shark on tilt!Thanks 4 Hungry Shark,Developers.Advice 2 Gamers:\"Get Hungry Shark 1,2+3!*They all Rock+Enjoy Ur Supper!!
reviews.author: Ryan Vollmer

reviews.title: Not to bad
reviews.comment: I Think This Game Has To Be Fixed!It Says \"Force To Close\" When I Opened!!Fix It Please!!

reviews.title: Bad bad bad
reviews.comment: So bad compared to hungrg shark evolution. Do not download. Terrible control and graphics also so slow

reviews.title: What the hell
reviews.comment: How is this part 2? Clearly, it\'s a downgrade from the original game. Graphics are horrible.

reviews.comment: This is a awesome game if u dont belive me then I am good at this game im the pro just get it

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Played hungry sharks evo first. Saw this in the market and thought it was a new one. Not bad for an original but you might want to save time and just play hungry sharks evo instead. Better graphics, more sharks, much more enjoyable.
reviews.author: matt barr

reviews.title: Hungry Shark Evolution is so much better
reviews.comment: Save yourself time and skip to Hungry Shark Evolution. It\'s sooooo much more improved than the earlier versions.

reviews.comment: Great game. Been waiting for a year for checkpoints, yet still no joy... even though about half the comments here are about this..??
